*.description: May see and clone all repositories
May see, clone and push to all repositories
May see and rename all repositories
May see, clone, push to, configure and delete all repositories
May mark repositories as "archived" and therefore unmodifiable
May administer permissions (additionally needs 'administer users' and/or 'administer groups').

list.description: Prerequisite for all other administration permissions. Without this, no configuration will be visible.

global.description: May configure core settings of SCM-Manager

*.description: May configure settings of SCM-Manager core and all plugins

read,write.description: May create, modify and delete custom repository roles and their permissions

read.description: May see all installed and available plugins

read,write.description: May see and manage all installed and available plugins

permissionRead.description: May see the permissions set for namespaces

permissionRead,permissionWrite.description: May read and modify the permissions set for namespaces

read.description: May see the repository inside the SCM-Manager

modify.description: May modify the basic properties of the repository

push.description: May change the content of the repository (push/commit)

permissionRead.description: May see the permissions of the repository

permissionWrite.description: May modify the permissions of the repository

archive.description: May mark the repository as "archived" and therefore unmodifiable

*.description: May change everything for the repository (includes all other permissions)

AGR7UzkhA1.description: The requested entity could not be found. It may have been deleted in another session.

FtR7UznKU1.description: There is already an entity with the same key values.

9BR7qpDAe1.description: You do not have the permission to change the password.

2wR7UzpPG1.description: The entity has been modified concurrently by another user or another process. Please reload the entity.

9SR8G0kmU1.description: The version control system for this repository does not support the requested feature.

CmR8GCJb31.description: The server encountered an internal error. Please contact your administrator for further assistance.

92RCCCMHO1.displayName: An internal URL could not be found
92RCCCMHO1.description: An internal request could not be handled by the server. Please contact your administrator for further assistance.

2VRCrvpL71.description: The data sent to the server could not be handled. Please check the values you have entered or contact your administrator for further assistance.

8pRBYDURx1.description: The data sent to the server had an illegal data type. Please contact your administrator for further assistance.

1wR7ZBe7H1.description: The values could not be validated. Please correct your input and try again.

3zR9vPNIE1.description: The values could not be validated. Please correct your input and try again.

CHRM7IQzo1.description: The requested modification to the repository was rejected. The most likely reason for this are checks from plugins. Please check your settings. See the following messages for more details:

ASSG1ehZ01.description: The requested modification to the repository was rejected. There were no more messages.

thbsUFokjk.description: A identifier value has been changed in the entity. This is not allowed.

40RaYIeeR1.description: No changes were made to the files of the repository. Therefore no new commit could be created. Possibly changes cannot be applied due to an .ignore-File definition.

ERS2vYb7U1.description: Namespaces can only be changed if namespace strategy is "custom".

4iRct4avG1.description: The revisions have unrelated histories. Therefore there is no common commit to compare with.

65RdZ5atX1.description: Some files to cancel the plugin (un)installation could not be deleted. This can lead to inconsistencies so that the SCM-Manager cannot restart properly. Please check the logs and clean up the plugin folder manually. To cancel the installation of a plugin, remove the corresponding smp file. To cancel the uninstallation, remove the file named 'uninstall' inside the directory for this plugin.

6eRhF9gU41.description: The selected merge strategy is not supported by the repository.

78RhWxTIw1.description: The default branch of a repository cannot be deleted. Please select another default branch first.

1yRiASshD1.description: The anonymous user cannot be deleted since the anonymous access is still enabled in the configuration.

8LRncum0S1.description: There was an error or an unexpected condition while handling the native repository. Please consult the logs for further information.

4GRrgkSC01.description: The merge led to an unexpected result, that could not be handled automatically. More details could be found in the log. Please merge the branches manually.

6mRuFxaWM1.description: The checksum of the downloaded plugin did not match the expected checksum. Please try again or check the internet settings like proxies.

9iRuFz1UB1.description: The plugin could not be loaded from the server. Please try again or check the internet settings like proxies. More information can be found in the server log.

8nRuFzjss1.displayName: Error while cleaning up failed plugin
8nRuFzjss1.description: A failed plugin download could not be removed correctly. Please check the server log and remove the plugin manually.

5GS6lwvWF1.description: One of the plugin dependencies could not be found. Please check the server logs for more details.

E5S6niWwi1.description: The plugin depends on a newer version of an already installed plugin. Please check the server logs for more details.

4RS6niPRX1.description: The downloaded plugin does not match the information provided by the plugin center. Please check the server logs for more details.

2qRyyaVcJ1.description: The input had some invalid formats. Please check the server log for further information.

3tS0mjSoo1.displayName: Error creating a new working directory
3tS0mjSoo1.description: The server could not create a new working directory to process the request. Please check the server log for further information.

3US6mweXy1.description: Public keys generated by the server are readonly and cannot be deleted.

BxS5wX2v71.description: The provided key is not a valid public key.

FVS9JY1T21.description: While processing the request there was an error. Please check the http return status and the concrete error message.

D6SHRfqQw1.description: The repository could not be imported. It's likely that either the credentials (username/password) are wrong or missing. Please check your inputs.

3FSIYtBJw1.displayName: An entity could not be stored
3FSIYtBJw1.description: An entity could not be stored, because the corresponding store was set to read only. Please see the log for more information.

3hSIlptme1.description: The repository is marked as "archived" and therefore must noch be modified.
